abstract: Neil Harbisson, a colorblind European artist who has gained fame as a cyborg who "sees" colors through sound, is planning to have an operation that will fuse his listening device to his skull. Since 2004 he has worn a series of devices that translate color into sound.

headline.main: A Surgical Implant for Seeing Colors Through Sound
